overview.description: While refrigerator repairs might sound intimidating, 75% of our customers rate them as 'Easy' and most issues can be fixed in under 20 minutes with basic tools.
overview.call_to_action: Want Mr. Appliance to fix that broken Refrigerator?

common_symptoms.description: Discover how to troubleshoot a refrigerator that's not cooling by checking components like the condenser coils, evaporator fan, and thermostat.
Learn how to fix an ice maker that has stopped producing ice by testing the water inlet valve, ice maker module, and fill tube.
Find out why your refrigerator's water dispenser isn't working by checking the water filter, inlet valve, and dispenser actuator.
Diagnose water leakage issues by inspecting the defrost drain, water tank assembly, and water inlet valve.
Troubleshoot excessive frost buildup in the freezer or fridge by checking the defrost heater, thermostat, and door gasket.
Fix a refrigerator that runs non-stop by checking the temperature control thermostat, defrost timer, and condenser coils.
Silence a noisy fridge by investigating the evaporator fan motor, condenser fan motor, or compressor noise.
